title: Chi Mi Shaonu
synopsis: Killing in secret rooms, disappearing out of thin air, impossible crime, floating corpses, instant beheading... 　　 The world in which we exist is surrounded by all kinds of mysteries, which are like fog covering the binoculars, and like a yarn covering the truth. A genius and beautiful girl who “will age and die if you don’t think about it”, with an IQ that surpasses ordinary people, with “the power of logic” as a weapon, and a bet on life, she copes with a series of bizarre bizarreness with the dumb and cute man The incident has broken down every unheard criminal technique and solved all kinds of mysteries remaining in the world. 　　 Reasoning... just to live. (translated from douban)
